column2: immediately below the [[Black Gate]] of the Morannon.<ref>{{RK|Map}}</ref> This was the site of several important battles in [[Gondor|Gondor's]] history
column3: most notably the defeat of [[Sauron|Sauron's]] forces in the famous [[Battle of Dagorlad]] in {{SA|3434}}
column4: <ref>{{App|SA}}</ref> King [[Calimehtar (King of Gondor)|Calimehtar]]'s victory over the [[Easterlings]] in {{TA|1899}}
